channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mortgage Calculator / Loan Calculator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mortgage Calculator / Loan Calculator

item.title: CVE-2021-24828|2024-08-03T19:42:17.224Z -- unknown -- mortgage%20calculator%20%2F%20loan%20calculator
item.description: The Mortgage Calculator / Loan Calculator WordPress plugin before 1.5.17 does not escape the some of the attributes of its mlcalc shortcode before outputting them, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
